trans-unit.source: Eyegrade uses a webcam to grade multiple choice question (MCQ) exams. Needing just a cheap low-end webcam, it aims to be a low-cost and portable solution available to everyone, on the contrary to other solutions based on scanners.
trans-unit.target: Eyegrade 使用网络摄像头对多项选择题（MCQ）考试进行评分。与基于扫描仪的其他解决方案相反，它只需要一种廉价的低端网络摄像头，就可以成为所有人都可以使用的低成本便携式解决方案。

trans-unit.source: An article describing an earlier version of Eyegrade has been published by the Journal of Science Education and Technology:
trans-unit.target: 科学教育与技术杂志》发表了一篇描述Eyegrade早期版本的文章。

trans-unit.source: Bug reports, feature requests and pull requests are welcome at the Github repository:
trans-unit.target: 欢迎在Github版本库中提交Bug报告、功能请求和拉取请求。

trans-unit.source: Exporting grades: Grades can be exported in Office Open XML format (.XLSX files that can be read from Microsoft Excel LibreOffice, Google Docs and other spreadsheet software) as well as the CSV (comma-separated values) format.
trans-unit.target: 导出成绩：成绩可以 Office Open XML格式（可以从Microsoft Excel LibreOffice，Google Docs和其他电子表格软件读取的.XLSX文件）以及 CSV（逗号分隔值）格式导出。

trans-unit.source: Eyegrade is fully functional and has been used in courses at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid and other institutions since 2010.
trans-unit.target: Eyegrade功能完备,自2010年起已在马德里卡洛斯三世大学和其他机构的课程中使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Eyegrade you can visit:
trans-unit.target: 有关Eyegrade的更多信息,你可以访问。

trans-unit.source: Grade MCQ exams with a webcam
trans-unit.target: 用网络摄像头进行MCQ考试评分

trans-unit.source: Grading exams: Using a webcam, the graphical user interface of Eyegrade allows you to scan and grade your students' exams. Eyegrade is able to recognize not only the answers to the questions, but also the identity of the student by using its hand-written digit recognition module. The whole process is supervised by you so that you can detect and fix any potential error of the image recognition system.
trans-unit.target: 给考试打分。使用网络摄像头,Eyegrade的图形用户界面可以让你扫描学生的考试并评分。Eyegrade不仅能识别问题的答案,还能通过手写数字识别模块识别学生的身份。整个过程由你来监督,这样你就可以发现并修正图像识别系统的任何潜在错误。

trans-unit.source: Jesus Arias Fisteus, Abelardo Pardo and Norberto Fernández García, Grading Multiple Choice Exams with Low-Cost and Portable Computer-Vision Techniques. Journal of Science Education and Technology, volume 22, issue 4 (August 2013), pages 560-571. doi:10.1007/s10956-012-9414-8.
trans-unit.target: Jesus Arias Fisteus，Abelardo Pardo和NorbertoFernándezGarcía， 采用低成本和便携式计算机视觉技术对多项选择题进行评分。《科学教育与技术杂志》，第22卷，第4期（2013年8月），第560-571页。 doi：10.1007 / s10956-012-9414-8。

trans-unit.source: Note for developers: the Eyegrade repository contains two main branches, master and development. The master branch will be placed at the latest stable release of Eyegrade. The development branch will receive commits of yet-to-be-released features. If you plan to submit pull-requests, base your work on the development branch in order to facilitate their integration.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员注意事项：Eyegrade存储库包含两个主要分支，master和development。该主分支将被放置在Eyegrade的最新的稳定版本。在发展 分行将收到的尚未将要发布的功能提交。如果您打算提交拉取请求，请基于开发分支工作，以促进它们的集成。

trans-unit.source: The downloads page, for pre-built binary files: https://www.eyegrade.org/download/
trans-unit.target: 下载页面，用于预构建的二进制文件：https : //www.eyegrade.org/download/

trans-unit.source: The main features of Eyegrade are:
The program is free software, licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL) version 3 or any later version.
trans-unit.target: 该程序是免费软件，根据GNU通用公共许可（GPL）版本3 或任何更高版本的条款获得许可 。

trans-unit.source: Typesetting exams: Although you can create your exams with other tools, Eyegrade integrates an utility to creating MCQ exams. It is able to create your exams in PDF format. Eyegrade can automatically build several versions of the exam by reordering questions and choices within questions. The LaTeX document preparation system must be installed in your system in order to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: 排版考试：尽管您可以使用其他工具创建考试，但Eyegrade集成了实用程序来创建MCQ考试。它能够创建PDF格式的考试。Eyegrade可以通过对问题和问题中的选项进行重新排序来自动构建考试的多个版本。在LaTeX的文档制作系统 必须安装在您的系统才能使用此功能。
